channel.title: GSoC 22 on home
channel.description: Recent content in GSoC 22 on home

item.title: [GSoC] Week 0: Community Bonding Period
item.description: So, I my proposal to the org git got accepted for GSoC 2022. For next few days, I will be exploring the codebase, also try to make some side contributions under the mentorship of Christian and Hariom. I am already in contact with them regarding the proposal. Till now, I have read most the “getting started” docs in Hacking Git. Yesterday, I was reading this very interesting tutorial on Write yourself a Git.
